hymn.title: Tell the Truth, Even to the Letter
hymn.category: Principles on How to Be a Proper Human Being—Be Truthful

lyrics.stanza: Tell the truth, even to the letter. Tell the truth, it makes you feel much better. Others then can count on you, When you speak a word so true. It is what we all should do, So tell the truth.
